original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Public Administration Home Affairs Provincial Councils and Local Government has declared June 30, 2023 to be a Special Bank Holiday.
Professor Manjula Fernando to be appointed as new PUCSL Chairman
Debt restructuring is a geopolitical issue – Ranil Wickremesinghe at New Global Financing Pact
All five people on the missing submersible are believed to have died from a catastrophic implosion; parts of the vessel have been identified on the ocean floor
